roleset.name: fare, manage, get along
roleset.note: FARE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'fare' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. (from fare.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: typical usage
example.text: Mr. Jennison said Northeast Bancorp also fared well because takeover stocks have returned to favor among investors.
example.arg: because takeover stocks have returned to favor among investors
